title: Understanding Personality Disorders
text: Personality disorders are complex and can arise from various factors. Consider both biological and environmental $$influences$$.

title: Biological Factors
text: Think about how genetics and brain changes might contribute to personality disorders.

title: Environmental Influences
text: Consider how experiences during childhood, such as trauma or abuse, might impact personality development.

title: Cultural Factors
text: Reflect on how cultural norms and expectations might play a role in the development of personality disorders.

hintAnswer: genetics, brain changes, childhood trauma and abuse, cultural factors
title: Identifying Causes
text: List the possible causes of personality disorders.
choices: when they exhibit enduring patterns of thoughts, emotions, and behaviors that deviate significantly from cultural norms and these patterns cause significant distress and impairment in functioning
genetics, brain changes, childhood trauma and abuse, cultural factors
Patterns of thoughts, emotions, and actions that are ineffective or counterproductive to normal, everyday life
